entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
